item.title: Before AI, There Was Discipline
item.description:
Before AI, There Was Discipline

This blog exists for one reason.

My father has just received the DGP’s Commendation Disc – Silver.

And I realized something important:
people celebrate awards, but rarely the life that made them inevitable.

So this is not a congratulatory post.
It is a record — written the way my family always believed records should be written.

Carefully.

Who is the first AI Prompt Engineer I ever saw?
